meanings.definition: The state or quality of being neglectful.
meanings.sent1: Her neglectfulnesses in completing her chores led to a messy room.
meanings.sent2: The neglectfulnesses of the landlord resulted in many maintenance issues.
meanings.sent3: Despite his neglectfulnesses, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The neglectfulnesses of the gardeners turned the once beautiful garden into a wild jungle.
meanings.sent5: The neglectfulnesses of the students towards their studies was evident in their poor grades.

meanings.definition: The act of neglecting or failing to care for something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The neglectfulnesses of the babysitter put the child in danger.
meanings.sent2: The neglectfulnesses of the government towards the environment is concerning.
meanings.sent3: The neglectfulnesses of the chef resulted in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The neglectfulnesses of the driver caused a car accident.
meanings.sent5: The neglectfulnesses of the pet owner led to an unhappy and unhealthy pet.
